# Parquet Schema Documentation

**Auto-generated from MongoDB → Parquet transformation**

---

## Table Overview

| Table | Rows | Description |
|-------|-----:|-------------|
| experiment_elements | 108 | Elements present in each experiment |
| experiments | 23 | Main experiment records with target formulas and status |
| powder_doses | 495 | Individual powder doses with accuracy tracking |
| temperature_logs | 46,314 | Time-series temperature measurements during heating |
| workflow_tasks | 123 | Lab automation workflow task tracking |
| xrd_data_points | 190,923 | Raw XRD diffraction pattern data (2θ vs counts) |

---

## Table Details

### experiment_elements
- **Rows:** 108
- **Primary Key:** None
- **Foreign Keys:** `experiment_id` → `experiment`

| Column | Type | Nullable | Notes |
|--------|------|----------|-------|
| experiment_id | VARCHAR | No | FK → experiment |
| element_symbol | VARCHAR | No | - |
| target_atomic_percent | VARCHAR | Yes | - |

### experiments
- **Rows:** 23
- **Primary Key:** `experiment_id`
- **Foreign Keys:** `experiment_id` → `experiment`, `finalization_decoded_sample_id` → `finalization_decoded_sample`

| Column | Type | Nullable | Notes |
|--------|------|----------|-------|
| experiment_id | VARCHAR | No | Primary Key, FK → experiment |
| name | VARCHAR | No | Unique |
| experiment_type | VARCHAR | No | - |
| experiment_subgroup | VARCHAR | No | Unique |
| target_formula | VARCHAR | No | Unique |
| last_updated | TIMESTAMP | No | Unique |
| status | VARCHAR | No | - |
| notes | VARCHAR | Yes | - |
| heating_method | VARCHAR | No | - |
| heating_temperature | FLOAT | No | - |
| heating_time | FLOAT | No | - |
| heating_cooling_rate | VARCHAR | Yes | - |
| heating_atmosphere | VARCHAR | Yes | - |
| heating_flow_rate_ml_min | VARCHAR | Yes | - |
| heating_low_temp_calcination | BOOLEAN | No | - |

| recovery_yield_percent | FLOAT | Yes | - |

| recovery_failure_classification | VARCHAR | Yes | - |
| xrd_sampleid_in_aeris | VARCHAR | No | Unique |
| xrd_holder_index | TINYINT | No | - |
| xrd_met_target_mass | BOOLEAN | No | - |
| finalization_decoded_sample_id | VARCHAR | Yes | FK → finalization_decoded_sample |
| finalization_successful_labeling | VARCHAR | Yes | - |
| finalization_storage_location | VARCHAR | Yes | - |
| dosing_crucible_position | TINYINT | No | - |
| dosing_crucible_sub_rack | VARCHAR | No | - |
| dosing_mixing_pot_position | TINYINT | No | - |
| dosing_ethanol_dispense_volume | SMALLINT | No | Unique |
| dosing_target_transfer_volume | SMALLINT | No | Unique |
| dosing_actual_transfer_mass | FLOAT | No | Unique |
| dosing_dac_duration | SMALLINT | No | - |
| dosing_dac_speed | SMALLINT | No | - |
| dosing_actual_heat_duration | INTEGER | No | Unique |
| dosing_end_reason | VARCHAR | No | - |

    EXPERIMENT_ELEMENTS {
        VARCHAR experiment_id "FK"
        VARCHAR element_symbol
        VARCHAR target_atomic_percent "nullable"
    }
    EXPERIMENTS {
        VARCHAR experiment_id "PK FK"
        VARCHAR name "UNIQUE"
        VARCHAR experiment_type
        VARCHAR experiment_subgroup "UNIQUE"
        VARCHAR target_formula "UNIQUE"
        TIMESTAMP last_updated "UNIQUE"
        VARCHAR status
        VARCHAR notes "nullable"
        VARCHAR heating_method
        FLOAT heating_temperature
        FLOAT heating_time
        VARCHAR heating_cooling_rate "nullable"
        VARCHAR heating_atmosphere "nullable"
        VARCHAR heating_flow_rate_ml_min "nullable"
        BOOLEAN heating_low_temp_calcination
        FLOAT recovery_total_dosed_mass_mg
        FLOAT recovery_yield_percent "nullable"
        VARCHAR recovery_initial_crucible_weight_mg "nullable"
        VARCHAR recovery_failure_classification "nullable"
        VARCHAR xrd_sampleid_in_aeris "UNIQUE"
        TINYINT xrd_holder_index
        BOOLEAN xrd_met_target_mass
        VARCHAR finalization_decoded_sample_id "FK"
        VARCHAR finalization_successful_labeling "nullable"
        VARCHAR finalization_storage_location "nullable"
        TINYINT dosing_crucible_position
        VARCHAR dosing_crucible_sub_rack
        TINYINT dosing_mixing_pot_position
        SMALLINT dosing_ethanol_dispense_volume "UNIQUE"
        SMALLINT dosing_target_transfer_volume "UNIQUE"
        FLOAT dosing_actual_transfer_mass "UNIQUE"
        SMALLINT dosing_dac_duration
        SMALLINT dosing_dac_speed
        INTEGER dosing_actual_heat_duration "UNIQUE"
        VARCHAR dosing_end_reason
    }
    POWDER_DOSES {
        VARCHAR experiment_id "FK"
        VARCHAR powder_name
        FLOAT target_mass
        FLOAT actual_mass
        FLOAT accuracy_percent
        TINYINT dose_sequence
        TINYINT head_position
        VARCHAR dose_timestamp
    }
    TEMPERATURE_LOGS {
        VARCHAR experiment_id "FK"
        SMALLINT sequence_number
        FLOAT time_minutes
        FLOAT temperature_celsius
    }
    WORKFLOW_TASKS {
        VARCHAR experiment_id "FK"
        VARCHAR task_id "FK"
        VARCHAR task_type
        VARCHAR status
        TIMESTAMP created_at
        TIMESTAMP started_at
        TIMESTAMP completed_at
    }
    XRD_DATA_POINTS {
        VARCHAR experiment_id "FK"
        SMALLINT point_index
        FLOAT twotheta
        FLOAT counts
    }
    EXPERIMENTS ||--o{ EXPERIMENT_ELEMENTS : "experiment_id"

    EXPERIMENTS ||--o{ TEMPERATURE_LOGS : "experiment_id"
    EXPERIMENTS ||--o{ WORKFLOW_TASKS : "experiment_id"
